title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 531.5 - Increase in rates prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 531.5 - Increase in rates prohibited

State Regulations

No corporation, partnership or person furnishing gas, electric, steam or water service shall so revise or redraft its rate schedules
in compliance with this Part as to increase the rates for service applicable to
any customer as compared with the rates now in effect without special
permission of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
531.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
